title: 1944년 McNamee 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: McNamee. 판결일: 1944-10-16. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Patrick McNamee
**판결일**: 1944-10-16
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 268 A.D. 871

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by defendant from a judgment of the County Court of Putnam County, convicting him of the crime of attempted rape in the first degree and sentencing him to not less than five and not more than ten years in prison. Judgment unanimously affirmed. No opinion. Present — Close, P. J., Hagarty, Carswell, Lewis and Aldrich, JJ. [See post, p. 999.]
...
